QuestData.Title: Mojo Mischief
QuestData.Description:
De soldiers you rescued spoke of de raids on Zandalar. Blood troll raiders, frothing at de mouth and possessing supernatural strength, overwhelmed de defenders.
Dey say dat their strength came from flasks of mojo dat de raiders drink before going into combat. We cannot allow de blood trolls to continue to possess them.
Go down into de camp and destroy any of their flasks you may find.
